scripts.test:api: docker compose -p test-api -f docker-compose.test.yml build && docker compose -p test-api -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm api; exitcode=$?; docker compose -p test-api -f docker-compose.test.yml down; exit ${exitcode}
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:front-admin && npm run build:front && npm run build:package
scripts.build:api: cd api && npm ci --include=dev && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:front-admin: cd front-admin && npm ci --force --include=dev && npm run build && mv dist/browser ../api/dist/front-admin && cd ..
scripts.build:front: cd front && npm ci --force --include=dev && npm run build && mv dist/browser ../api/dist/front && cd ..
scripts.check:vulnerabilities: npx @aikidosec/safe-chain setup && cd api && npx @aikidosec/safe-chain setup && cd ../front && npx @aikidosec/safe-chain setup && cd ../front-admin && npx @aikidosec/safe-chain setup && cd ..
